# normalizedPositionWillChange(_:)

**Instance Method**

Notifies the cell when its normalized position is about to change.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func normalizedPositionWillChange(_ nextNormalizedPosition: CGFloat)
```

## Managing Cell Position

- **normalizedPositionDidChange()**: Notifies the cell when its normalized position changes.
